actions.text: Reported to House by House Committee on Education and Labor. Report No: 98-963.

official_title: A bill to authorize funds for the John W. McCormack Institute of Public Affairs, and for other purposes.
short_title: John W. McCormack Institute of Public Affairs Act

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Education and Labor with amendment, H. Rept. 98-963) John W. McCormack Institute of Public Affairs Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to provide funds to assist in the development of the John W. McCormack Institute of Public Affairs at the University of Massachusetts, Boston, Massachusetts. Permits such payments to be used in furtherance of the Institute's mission of research, instruction, and civic education related to public policy and the role of representative government in the United States. Requires that funds appropriated pursuant to this Act be made available to the Institute on or after October 1, 1984, and prior to the close of FY 1987. Authorizes appropriations to carry out this Act for FY 1985 through 1987. Limits the aggregate amount of such appropriations. Provides that such appropriations shall remain available until expended.

titles.title: John W. McCormack Institute of Public Affairs Endowment Act
